::Hot Rod::

"Hot Rod, MAXIMIZE!" Hot Rod transformes to bot mode, and followes
Arcangel and co. closer to the Alliance base.

::Drillbit::

Drillbit looked around at what he could see. The place seemed good
enough, but if Megatron was foolesh, he would go to the Alliance.
